Package rohde_schwarz.rs_instrument

Class Visa

java.lang.Object
rohde_schwarz.rs_instrument.Visa
Direct Known Subclasses:
VisaSession
public class Visa extends Object
Universal class that uses IVisaPlugin object and unifies it for all the object above. It also contains special methods for reading and writing to/from streams.

    • getVisaPlugin

      public static IVisaPlugin getVisaPlugin​(String plugin) throws VisaException
      Returns VISA plugin object based on entered string descriptor. Supported plugins: - VisaC - VisaC-RsVisa - VisaC-NiVisa
      Throws:
      VisaException

    • read

      public ReadResponse read​(int maxLength, boolean assureEndsWithTc) throws VisaException
      Reads data from instrument with defined maximum length. The maxLength value cannot exceed the ReadResponse.MAX_LEN
      Throws:
      VisaException

    • readToStream

      public ReadStatus readToStream​(OutputStream stream, int maxLength, boolean assureEndsWithTc) throws VisaException
